text: Bafodeya is a genus of plants in the family Chrysobalanaceae described in 1976.Ghillean Prance ex White, Frank. 1976. Bulletin du Jardin Botanique National de Belgique 46(3–4): 271 There is only one known species, Bafodeya benna, native to tropical West Africa (Mali, Guinea, Sierra Leone).Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesBoudet, G., Lebrun, J.P. & Demange, R. (1986). Catalogue des plantes vasculaires du Mali: 1-465. Etudes d'Elevage et de Médecine Vétérinaire des Pays Tropicaux. The species is listed as vulnerable. ==References== Category:Chrysobalanaceae Category:Monotypic Malpighiales genera Category:Flora of West Tropical Africa Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Chrysobalanaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Bafodeya
